text: It says to update the plan.

Morning,
how does the font selector work? We want to use a Google Font, but the one we want to use is not appearing - is the dropdown not updated at all times? (It's partly new)

I was trying add HubSpot chat support to our app
but chat won't load on Environment though it works on local

Any CSP need to be taken care of

Hi

Can anyone help with the Google Re-captcha on the website.
I have not added Re-Captcha on any form the website, but when I check the speed of the website in google it shows the recaptcha files delaying the speed.

This is not added statically anywhere on the website.  not under global content settings.

But when I remove the {{ standard_footer_includes }} from my template then these files are no more detected in speed index.

Can anyone have idea from where the files are being added on the website?
Can I change the unsubscribe button on HubSpot emails I send to my customers to redirect to my platform subscription preferences page instead of the HubSpot subscription preferences page?

Hello, What would be the best way to removed unused css? from my style.css?

Total Bytes: 655 604
Unused Bytes: 617 559

Shouldn't HubSpot do this automatically?
is Inbound in-person only this year?
It is, but the main stage talks will be live streamed on YouTube :)
I’m getting a bug in the Blog Post editor — the “Edit Module” panel closes whenever I try to expand a field group. Anyone else run into this? Is it something that’s known?
Scratch that, clicking anywhere in the “Edit Module” panel closes it.

Hey all,

I'm trying to retrieve a file uploaded to HS File system via a form through API. I've gotten the search API working okay with it, but there's alot of bad data its returning from what I suppose is temporary files.

Is there a way to find the exact parent folder ID for the form-uploads? Or anyway to retrieve the ID of form attachments via the URL?

thanks

Hey!

Is there any way for me to use HubSpot as a headless CMS?

Your name looks familiar for some reason :wink:.

Are you using the dedicated file search endpoint? If so, there’s a parentFolderId param:

```curl --request GET \
  --url '<https://api.hubapi.com/files/v3/files/search?parentFolderId=12345>'```
I might be misunderstanding the q.
nah you're right - just a matter of finding out the right folder to grab the stuff lol
